amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds for the Ironwood Forest National Monument that was designated under the Antiquities Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 63 printed in House Report 115-830 to prohibit the use of funds for the Ironwood Forest National Monument.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A057) Failed by recorded vote: 193 - 220 (Roll no. 355).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A057) offered by Mr. Gosar.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A057) Failed by recorded vote: 193 - 220 (Roll no. 355).
